answers.answer: Yes, this is the correct site. Trust me - we all hate this disease (at least I do!).  Don't know what you mean when you say "out of control".  Sure hope you have a physician who can not only run test but put you on medication to help control this.My niece was over 18 when she discovered that she had Type 1 so I know that this stuff is quite crazy.  This ailment runs in both sides of my family (my dad & my mother's brother)No matter what age you are when the Diabetes is discovered you need to have medical supervision & regular test.  Don't know exactly what help you want here but give out more information and someone here will certainly have answers.  Believe me - no matter what, we have all been through it.Anita

question: Man I have tried other sites can't get anwsers. So confused i hate this stupid dissease! Some one help! My diabetes is out of control. teen with type two that no one understands.
title: Can type 2 teen post?
